世界一？可愛い\r\n: Who's the cutest in the world? It's me
宇宙一？可愛い\r\n: The cutest in the universe? It's me
もっともっと聞かせて\r\n: Hear me out more and more
ご褒美は…目を閉じて？ \r\n: What will be your reward...? Close your eyes
生き甲斐にしちゃってもいいのよ\r\n: I'll make this a good reason to live for
一人じゃ無理だ 逆境\r\n: I can't take on adversities alone
みんながいれば最強\r\n: We're the strongest when we're together
見つめ合って両想い\r\n: When our eyes meet, we both think
涙じゃ何も解決しないの分かってるから\r\n: I know tears won't fix anything
ご褒美は…目を閉じて？\r\n: What will be your reward...? Close your eyes
間違うの怖くなるけど\r\n: I'm afraid of making mistakes, but
できるできるできるできる\r\n: I can do it, I can do it, I can do it
そうだ！信じてくれる人がいる\r\n: Yes, I can! There's someone who believes in me
この歌で君と繋がっていられる\r\n: This song keeps me connected to you
忘れられないストーリー描いてこう\r\n: Let's picture a story we'll never forget
